text: bahudevavaadee kahenge, "yadi allaah chaahata to na ham saajheedaar thaharaate aur na hamaare poorvaj hee; aur na ham kisee cheez ko (bina allaah ke aadesh ke) haraam thaharaate." aise hee unase pahale ke logon ne bhee jhuthalaaya tha, yahaan tak kee unhen hamaaree yaatana ka maza chakhana pada. kaho, "kya tumhaare paas koee gyaan hai ki use hamaare paas pesh karo? tum log keval gumaan par chalate ho aur nire atakal se kaam lete ho.
